docs.snippet: A group of hikers plunged down a long, steep icy slope in the mountains near Los Angeles on Saturday, killing one and injuring four others, one of them critically, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of hikers plunged down a long, steep icy slope in the mountains near Los Angeles on Saturday, killing one and injuring four others, one of them critically, authorities said.

headline.main: 1 Dead, 4 Hurt in Los Angeles-Area Mountain Ice Disaster
headline.print_headline: 1 Dead, 4 Hurt in Los Angeles-Area Mountain Ice Disaster

docs.snippet: Malcolm Butler saved the day for the Patriots in the Super Bowl two years ago as an unheralded rookie, and hopes his next big moment comes in Sunday's Super Bowl against the Atlanta Falcons....
docs.lead_paragraph: Malcolm Butler saved the day for the Patriots in the Super Bowl two years ago as an unheralded rookie, and hopes his next big moment comes in Sunday's Super Bowl against the Atlanta Falcons.

headline.main: Butler Did It Last Time, Hopes for Another Super Success
headline.print_headline: Butler Did It Last Time, Hopes for Another Super Success

docs.snippet: Women comprise 45 percent of the National Football League fan base, says an NFL spokeswoman as the league focuses on attracting more young women to the sport....

docs.snippet: Here is a document that Freedom Partners — a group organized and funded by the Koch brothers — released in early January, detailing what it hoped President Trump and Congress would do first, in terms of rolling back regulations, many of which ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Here is a document that Freedom Partners — a group organized and funded by the Koch brothers — released in early January, detailing what it hoped President Trump and Congress would do first, in terms of rolling back regulations, many of which impact the energy industry. Congress and Mr. Trump started to move through the list this past week.

docs.snippet: La Liga leaders Real Madrid's game with Celta Vigo on Sunday has been postponed amid safety fears after the Balaidos stadium roof was damaged by storms, the league's governing body announced on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: La Liga leaders Real Madrid's game with Celta Vigo on Sunday has been postponed amid safety fears after the Balaidos stadium roof was damaged by storms, the league's governing body announced on Saturday.

headline.main: Real Madrid Game at Celta Postponed After Stadium Damaged in Storm
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Game at Celta Postponed After Stadium Damaged in Storm

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma lawmaker who admitted asking a legislative aide to send him topless photos and accompany him to a strip club announced plans to resign on Saturday, two days after a special House committee recommended he be expelled from office....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma lawmaker who admitted asking a legislative aide to send him topless photos and accompany him to a strip club announced plans to resign on Saturday, two days after a special House committee recommended he be expelled from office.

headline.main: Oklahoma Lawmaker Accused of Harassment Submits Resignation
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Lawmaker Accused of Harassment Submits Resignation
